instruction: Explain the significance of using data visualization.
output: Data visualization is a powerful tool used to convey information in an organized, appealing and understandable way. It can help to make complex data or patterns easier to comprehend, enabling viewers to quickly identify trends or patterns. Data visualization can also be used to effectively communicate complicated information to a variety of different people, such as stakeholders, clients or members of the public. It is also a useful tool in business as it can help decision makers to identify opportunities and make informed decisions.
